languages.text: {n}Дознаватель смотрит на фигуры, поднятая в задумчивости рука подрагивает. Кажется, из Хейнрикса ушла вся кровь: белое лицо пронизано венами, на рукаве и воротнике застыл сверкающий иней.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель смотрит на фигуры, поднятая в задумчивости рука подрагивает. Кажется, из Хейнрикса ушла вся кровь: белое лицо пронизано венами, на рукаве и воротнике застыл сверкающий иней. При вашем появлении дознаватель едва шевелится.{/n} "{name}".

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator stares at the playing pieces, immersed in thought, and the hand resting at his jaw is shaking. Heinrix looks as though he has been drained of blood: the veins on his face stand out starkly against his pallid skin, and his cuff and collar glitter with a fringe of hoarfrost.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель смотрит на фигуры, поднятая в задумчивости рука подрагивает. Кажется, из Хейнрикса ушла вся кровь: белое лицо пронизано венами, на рукаве и воротнике застыл сверкающий иней.{/n}

{n}The Interrogator stares at the playing pieces, immersed in thought, and the hand resting at his jaw is shaking. Heinrix looks as though he has been drained of blood: the veins on his face stand out starkly against his pallid skin, and his cuff and collar glitter with a fringe of hoarfrost.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希盯着棋子，沉浸在思考中，拄着下巴的手不住地颤抖着。他看起来就像是被吸干了血一样，脸上的青筋在苍白皮肤的映衬下，显得格外显眼，冰凌在他的袖口与领口上泛着光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator stares at the playing pieces, immersed in thought, and the hand resting at his jaw is shaking. Heinrix looks as though he has been drained of blood: the veins on his face stand out starkly against his pallid skin, and his cuff and collar glitter with a fringe of hoarfrost.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希盯着棋子，沉浸在思考中，拄着下巴的手不住地颤抖着。他看起来就像是被吸干了血一样，脸上的青筋在苍白皮肤的映衬下，显得格外显眼，冰凌在他的袖口与领口上泛着光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El interrogador mira fijamente las piezas del tablero, absorto en sus pensamientos. La mano que se ha llevado a la mandíbula tiembla. Parecería que a Heinrix no le queda sangre en el cuerpo: las venas de su cara destacan contra su pálida piel y los cuellos y puños de su ropa brillan con escarcha.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator stares at the playing pieces, immersed in thought, and the hand resting at his jaw is shaking. Heinrix looks as though he has been drained of blood: the veins on his face stand out starkly against his pallid skin, and his cuff and collar glitter with a fringe of hoarfrost.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador mira fijamente las piezas del tablero, absorto en sus pensamientos. La mano que se ha llevado a la mandíbula tiembla. Parecería que a Heinrix no le queda sangre en el cuerpo: las venas de su cara destacan contra su pálida piel y los cuellos y puños de su ropa brillan con escarcha.{/n}

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは思考に没頭しながら駒を見つめる。顎を置いた手は震えていた。ハインリックスは血の気のない顔をしていた。その顔の血管は青白い肌にくっきりと浮き立ち、袖口と襟元は霧氷の縁取りで光っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator stares at the playing pieces, immersed in thought, and the hand resting at his jaw is shaking. Heinrix looks as though he has been drained of blood: the veins on his face stand out starkly against his pallid skin, and his cuff and collar glitter with a fringe of hoarfrost.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは思考に没頭しながら駒を見つめる。顎を置いた手は震えていた。ハインリックスは血の気のない顔をしていた。その顔の血管は青白い肌にくっきりと浮き立ち、袖口と襟元は霧氷の縁取りで光っていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Perdu dans ses pensées, le menton appuyé sur une main tremblante, l'interrogateur regarde fixement les pièces de jeu. Un court instant, vous vous demandez s'il ne s'est pas vidé de son sang tant les veines de son visage forment un contraste flagrant avec la pâleur de sa peau. Du givre a commencé à se former sur ses manchettes et le col de sa veste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator stares at the playing pieces, immersed in thought, and the hand resting at his jaw is shaking. Heinrix looks as though he has been drained of blood: the veins on his face stand out starkly against his pallid skin, and his cuff and collar glitter with a fringe of hoarfrost.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Perdu dans ses pensées, le menton appuyé sur une main tremblante, l'interrogateur regarde fixement les pièces de jeu. Un court instant, vous vous demandez s'il ne s'est pas vidé de son sang tant les veines de son visage forment un contraste flagrant avec la pâleur de sa peau. Du givre a commencé à se former sur ses manchettes et le col de sa veste.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator starrt gedankenverloren auf die Spielfiguren. Er stützt sein Kinn mit zitternder Hand. Heinrix sieht aus, als wäre er völlig blutleer, die Adern in seinem Gesicht heben sich deutlich von seiner blassen Haut ab und an seiner Manschette und seinem Kragen glitzert Raureif.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator stares at the playing pieces, immersed in thought, and the hand resting at his jaw is shaking. Heinrix looks as though he has been drained of blood: the veins on his face stand out starkly against his pallid skin, and his cuff and collar glitter with a fringe of hoarfrost.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator starrt gedankenverloren auf die Spielfiguren. Er stützt sein Kinn mit zitternder Hand. Heinrix sieht aus, als wäre er völlig blutleer, die Adern in seinem Gesicht heben sich deutlich von seiner blassen Haut ab und an seiner Manschette und seinem Kragen glitzert Raureif.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, düşüncelere dalmış bir hâlde oyun taşlarını seyrediyor. Çenesine dayadığı eli titriyor. Heinrix, âdeta kanı çekilmiş gibi görünüyor. Yüzündeki damarlar, solgun teninde karşıtlık yaratırcasına göze çarpıyor. Manşetleri ile yakası, kırağıdan oluşma bir saçakla parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator stares at the playing pieces, immersed in thought, and the hand resting at his jaw is shaking. Heinrix looks as though he has been drained of blood: the veins on his face stand out starkly against his pallid skin, and his cuff and collar glitter with a fringe of hoarfrost.{/n}
